item.description: Frame In the context of computing, a frame is a single image displayed by a monitor. By displaying a series of frames in rapid succession, the illusion of a motion can be conveyed on a monitor.
Game Ideas Isekai Sim Trope-heavy singleplayer RPG granting players a power fantasy/wish fullfillment world. For my own use to study RPG game design
Game Loop The Game Loop defines the individual steps a [[Game Engine|game engine]] executes in order to produce a working game.
Movement Speed The rate of change of position over a fixed time-step in any direction. Speed = Distance / Time
